wait, what?

didn't you release the other torrent?

icetgamer, I would use the other one, this one is the size of the demo, not the full game.
idiot can't you see the word "RePack"

BrokeRobot
It's just compresed. So it's smaller in size. It works fine though.

the game is based on text files which compress extremely well.
